main event: On July 8, 1965, a civilian reported sighting a strange object that appeared like a star moving quickly in a northeasterly direction in Cincinnati, Ohio.
interesting points: The object was described as looking like a round ball with a fuzzy trail behind it,The sighting lasted approximately 15 minutes as the object passed over the Big Dipper,The observer noted that the object was flying at a tremendous speed, much faster than any known aircraft,The report includes both a formal submission and a personal letter to Major Quintanilla,The conclusion of the report suggests the object was a satellite.
sighted object: a strange object resembling a star
witness description: a civilian who observed the event
